mapper.select: select sp.id id,sp.text text,sp.url href,sp.parentid pid from sys_user_role sur, sys_role_permission srp, sys_permission sp where sur.sysuserid=#{userId} and sur.sysroleid = srp.sysroleid and srp.syspermissionid = sp.id and sp.parentid=#{pid} and sp.type = 'menu'

select sp.percode from sys_user_role sur, sys_role_permission srp, sys_permission sp where sur.sysuserid=#{id} AND sur.sysroleid = srp.sysroleid AND srp.syspermissionid = sp.id AND srp.syspermissionid=sp.id and (sp.percode <> '' or sp.percode is not NULL)
